## ğŸ“Š Transparency

We believe in transparency. Here's how we use sponsorship funds:

- **40%** - Infrastructure (servers, APIs, domains)
- **30%** - Development (new features, improvements)
- **20%** - Support & Documentation
- **10%** - Community & Marketing

Monthly reports are published in our [Discussions](https://github.com/winsnip-official/winscan.org/discussions) section.
